castlingMoves() - Method in class XXLChess.Pieces.King
Returns a list of castling moves, rules are: king is not checked king and rook are at first or last row king and rook haven't moved no obstacles between king and rook no squares between king and rook are under attacked

makeMove() - Method in class XXLChess.CPU
cpu/ player 2 makes a move based on preferences: checkmate opponent's king capture opponent's highest value piece or undefended piece move threatened piece to safety check opponent king random move
